content: I got an email from JetBrains saying that if any Wasmtime maintainers use RustRover -- https://www.jetbrains.com/rust/ -- that they're willing to give sponsored licenses to us for open source work. The license covers https://www.jetbrains.com/all/ and https://www.jetbrains.com/ai-ides/. If anyone uses RustRover and would like to take advantage of this feel free to PM me and I'll connect you to the right folks
